pageContext.claim: “And don't forget, they [Democrats] want to take 180 million private insurance plans away, people, 180 million people are going to be stripped of their great insurance that they have right now because we have made great insurance available to people.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump leaves out that this Medicare-for-all proposal from some Democrats -- not all Democrats -- in theory would replace private insurance with government-funded plans. So the 180 million people on private plans through employers would not necessarily go without coverage.
